          Adding Comments

          Instructions to add WordPress comments

          To manage comments in your website:

          • Go to Comments pane.

          • Mouse over a comment and choose a necessary action: Reply, Edit, Trash, etc.

          • Select the required comments, choose one of the available Bulk Actions and click Apply.

          • Use the All comment types drop-down list, the Filter button or the Search field to find a certain comment.
